page.title: 19CREDITS FOR AMBERLEY & BURY
page.content:
This contribution to the Domesday Project was made by:
Mr. A. Champion, Headmaster, Mr. R.E. Hillier and pupils of {Dorset House School.}
Mr. J.E. Lyne, Headmaster, Mrs. M. Hedley-Mann, Mrs G. Scutt, Mrs. S.E. Keighley, Yvonne Caldwell and other pupils of{Amberley Primary {School.
The residents who answered the children's questions. Mrs. J. Read and Mrs. J. Kelly. The Farmers involved in organising farm visits. Mr. G. Butler for his slides.
Particular thanks go to {Dr. J.L.S. Keighley}for putting this information onto disc.
